trans-unit.source: Defines <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> criteria to select part-level or package-level relationships.

PackageRelationshipSelector is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> class to specify a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts to be signed.

PackageRelationshipSelector is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> property of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> class to obtain a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts that have been signed with the given digital signature.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector"></xref> class.

The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> or the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> (`SourceUri`="/") that owns the relationship.

The type of the `selectionCriteria`, either by relationship <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> or relationship <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref>.
The qualification string that is used to select the relationships based on the `selectorType`.
sourceUri or selectionCriteria is .
The selectorType parameter is not valid.
The selectorType parameter is but selectionCriteria is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
The sourceUri is not the root ("/") and is also not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

Returns a list of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> objects that match the defined <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri*>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType*>, and <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria*>.
The package from which to select the relationships based on the selection criteria.
A list of relationships that match the selection parameters specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Gets the selection criteria specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

The selection criteria based on the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType*> of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> or <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

The selector type of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> or <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType"></xref> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

Gets the root package URI ("/") or part <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor as the owner of the relationship.

The root package URI ("/") or part <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*> specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.%23ctor%2A> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
